channel.title: Payette County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Payette County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 East approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-72. Turn left for ID-72; continue straight for access to I-84.

item.title: US-95 South at US-20/US-26
item.description: US-95 South at US-20/US-26 junction. US-20/US-26 joins US-95 south through Parma.

item.title: US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 south. Distance to Parma, Wilder, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-95 South At US-30
item.description: US-95 south at US-30 west to Ontario, Oregon. Continue south on US-95/US-30 for Parma and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 south. Distance to Fruitland, Parma, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-52 West at US-95
item.description: ID-52 west at US-95 in Payette. Turn right for US-95 north to Weiser; left for US-95 south to Fruitland. Continue west on ID-52 for Baker (City, Oregon). The ID-52 shield is the new style of Idaho state highway shield.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 3
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 3 - US-95/Fruitland/Payette. This is the last exit on I-84 westbound in Idaho.

item.title: US-30 East at ID-72
item.description: US-30 East at ID-72 East to Emmett. Continue east on US-30 for Caldwell and Boise.

item.title: US-30 East approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 East approaching ID-72. Turn left for ID-72; continue straight for access to I-84.

item.title: US-30 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to Emmett (via ID-72), Caldwell, and Boise.

item.title: US-30 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to New Plymouth and Emmett.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching US-95 - Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway
item.description: US-30 East approaching US-95. Turn right to continue on the Snake River Canyon Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-30 East - Entering Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on US-30 East. Entering Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 East at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 east at ID-72 junction. Turn left to continue on ID-52 east to Emmett. Turn right for ID-72 west to New Plymouth. Sand Hollow Road (old US-30) continues south.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95
item.description: ID-52 west at US-95 to Fruitland and Weiser. Continue west on ID-52 for Emmett.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95
item.description: ID-52 east at US-95 in Payette.

item.title: ID-52 East - Payette
item.description: ID-52 east (South 7th St.) at 2nd Ave. South. Turn left to continue east on ID-52 for Emmett. Continue south on South 7th St. for US-95 south to Fruitland and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-52 East - Payette
item.description: ID-52 east in Payette. This is the first ID-52 shield eastbound on ID-52.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Weiser, Hells Canyon (at Brownlee Reservoir via ID-71) and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-52
item.description: US-95 North at ID-52 in Payette.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-52
item.description: US-95 north at ID-52. Use ID-52 east to Emmett. Use US-95 north to Weiser and Lewiston.

item.title: ID-52 West - Payette
item.description: ID-52 west in Payette. Turn right on 7th St. to continue west on ID-52 for Baker City (Oregon).

item.title: ID-52 West at US-95
item.description: ID-52 west at US-95 in Payette. Turn right for US-95 north to Weiser; left for US-95 south to Fruitland. Continue west on ID-52 for Baker (City, Oregon).

item.title: US-30 West at US-95
item.description: US-30 west at US-95. Turn right on US-95 north for Fruitland and Payette. Turn left on US-95 south for I-84. US-30 follows US-95 north to Fruitland.

item.title: US-30 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 west. Distance to New Plymouth, Fruitland, and Payette.

item.title: End ID-72 West at US-30
item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30 in Payette County. Use US-30 west for I-84.

item.title: End ID-72 West at US-30
item.description: End ID-72 west at US-30. Turn right for US-30 west to New Plymouth and Emmett. Turn left for US-30 east to I-84.

item.title: End ID-72 Approaching US-30
item.description: End ID-72 approaching US-30 in Payette County.

item.title: ID-72 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-72 west. Distance to US-30.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 West at ID-72 west in Payette County. Turn right to continue west on ID-52. Continue straight for ID-72 west.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west at ID-72 west to New Plymouth. Use ID-52 west for Payette. Turn left for Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: ID-52 West Approaching ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west approaching ID-72 west in Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 West - Payette County
item.description: Entering Payette County on ID-52 west.

item.title: I-84 East - Speed Limit 80
item.description: Speed Limit 80/Truck Speed 70 on I-84 east. Idaho raised the speed limits on most rural interstates from 75 to 80 in July 2014.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 3 - US-95/Payette/Parma. First Idaho exit.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 3
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 3. Use Exit 3 for Fruitland, New Plymouth, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-30 East At US-95
item.description: US-30 East at US-95. Turn right for US-30 East/US-95 South; left for US-95 North. US-30 joins US-95 through Fruitland.

item.title: US-30 East Approaching US-95
item.description: US-30 East approaching US-95. Turn left for US-95 North to Weiser and Payette. Turn right for US-95 South/US-30 East for Parma. US-30 joins US-95 South through Fruitland.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 13
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 13 - Black Canyon Junction.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 3
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 3 - US-95/Payette/Parma. First Idaho exit.

item.title: I-84/US-30 Exit 9 Onramp
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 East (Exit 9) onramp to Caldwell and Boise. US-30 joins I-84 east to Bliss.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 9
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 9 - US-30/New Plymouth/Emmett.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 9
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 9 - US-30/New Plymouth/Emmett.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 3 - US-95/Payette/Parma. This is the first exit on I-84 eastbound in Idaho.

item.title: US-95 South At US-30
item.description: US-95 south at US-30 west to Ontario, Oregon. Continue south on US-95/US-30 for Parma and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-95 South at US-30
item.description: US-95 south at US-30 in Fruitland. US-30 east joins US-95 south through Fruitland.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-52
item.description: US-95 north at ID-52. Use ID-52 east to Emmett. Use US-95 north to Weiser and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 North at US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north at US-95 Spur junction. Merge right to continue north on US-95.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 Spur in Payette.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 spur in Payette. Turn right to continue north on US-95.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-95 Spur (Payette)
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-95 Spur in Payette.

item.title: Distance Marker on US-95 North - Fruitland
item.description: US-95 north - distance marker. Distance to Payette, Weiser, and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 North/US-30 West at Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-30 West at split in Fruitland.

item.title: US-95 North/US-30 West at US-30 Split
item.description: US-95 North/US-30 West at US-30 split in Fruitland. Turn left for US-30 west to Ontario (Oregon). Continue straight ahead for US-95 north to Payette and Weiser.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-30
item.description: US-95 North/US-30 West approaching US-30/US-95 split in Fruitland.

item.title: US-30 West at US-95
item.description: US-30 west at US-95. Use US-95 north to Fruitland and Payette; south to I-84. US-30 joins US-95 north through Fruitland.

item.title: US-30 West at ID-72
item.description: US-30 west at ID-72 east to Emmett. Continue west on US-30 for New Plymouth.

item.title: US-30 West At ID-72
item.description: US-30 west approaching ID-72 in Payette County.

item.title: US-30 West Approaching ID-72
item.description: US-30 west approaching ID-72 in Payette County.

item.title: I-84 at US-30 (Exit 9)
item.description: I-84 Exit 9 offramp. Turn right for US-30 west to New Plymouth.

item.title: I-84 at US-30 (Exit 9)
item.description: I-84, Exit 9 onramp to Ontario (Oregon). Continue straight for US-30 west to New Plymouth and Emmett.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 9
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 9 - US-30/New Plymouth.

item.title: I-84 West - Use Exit 3 For Hells Canyon Rec. Area
item.description: Hells Canyon Rec. Area next right, approaching Exit 3 on I-84 west.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 13, Black Canyon Junction.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 13
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 13, Black Canyon Junction, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 3
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 3, US-95/Fruitland/Payette.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 3
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 3, US-95/Payette/Fruitland.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 9
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 9, US-30/New Plymouth.

item.title: I-84 West Use Exit 3 For Weiser and Lewiston
item.description: Weiser and Lewiston next right, approaching Exit 3, US-95 on I-84 west.

item.title: ID-52 East - Payette
item.description: ID-52 east in Payette.

item.title: ID-52 East - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on ID-52 east. This sign was introduced in mid-2006.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95
item.description: ID-52 east approaching US-95.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95
item.description: ID-52 west at US-95 to Fruitland and Weiser.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95 Spur
item.description: ID-52 east at US-95 Spur to Fruitland and Winnemucca.

item.title: ID-52 East at US-95 Spur
item.description: ID-52 east approaching US-95 Spur.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west to Payette at ID-72 to New Plymouth, and Sand Hollow Road.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72
item.description: ID-52 west at ID-72 west in Payette County.

item.title: ID-52 West at ID-72 - To I-84
item.description: To I-84 at ID-52/ID-72 junction. For I-84 east, follow ID-72 to New Plymouth. For I-84 west, follow Sand Hollow Road to Caldwell.

item.title: Jct. ID-72 on ID-52 west
item.description: Junction ID-72 on ID-52 west in Payette County.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 3 Offramp at US-95
item.description: I-84 East (Exit 3) Offramp at US-95. Use US-95 south for Parma; use US-95 north for New Plymouth, Fruitland, and Payette.

item.title: ID-52 East at ID-72
item.description: ID-72 Junction to New Plymouth on ID-52 East
